scripts.banner:js: node Banner > Banner.txt && cat Banner.txt Resources/Public/Main.js > Main.js && rm Banner.txt && mv Main.js Resources/Public/Main.js
scripts.banner:css: node Banner > Banner.txt && cat Banner.txt Resources/Public/Main.css > Main.css && rm Banner.txt && mv Main.css Resources/Public/Main.css
scripts.build:css: node-sass Resources/Private/Styles/OutdatedBrowser.scss Resources/Public/Main.css && cssnano Resources/Public/Main.css Resources/Public/Main.css --autoprefixer.add true --autoprefixer.browsers: '> 1%' --no-zindex --discardComments.removeAll true && npm run banner:css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
